page.title: 07Transport in Kinoulton.
page.content: We did a survey of the{traffic passing up and down Main Street outside our school.We carried out the survey on three different days,at different times of day and for half an hour each time. We found that the{car}is the most common form of Transport in Kinoulton. At the moment there are a lot of {lorries}coming past our school with bricks because there is a lot of building going on.The second most common form of transport is the{van followed by{four- wheel- drive lorries and {buses.
